data.name: FinancialEntryOperationMustBe
data.value: The entry operation must be either {0}, {1}, {2} or {3}.

data.name: NameMaxCharacters
data.value: Name must be a maximum of 80 characters

data.name: BirthdayDateLessThanOrEqualToToday
data.value: The birth date cannot be greater than the current date.

data.name: PictureFileSupported
data.value: The image file format must be {0}

data.name: PetrolGreaterThanZero
data.value: The price of Petrol must be greater than zero.

data.name: EthanolGreaterThanZero
data.value: The price of Ethanol must be greater than zero.

data.name: CustomEfficiencyGreaterThanZero
data.value: The Custom Efficiency must be greater than zero.

data.name: MostAdvantageousFuel
data.value: Based on the efficiency of {0}, {1} is more advantageous because the equivalent price is {2}.

data.name: ReceiptFileSupported
data.value: The receipt file format must be {0}

data.name: StartDayOfMonthBetween
data.value: The first day of the month must be between 1 and 28.

data.name: SpendingAreaRequired
data.value: Spending area is required for this type of entry.

data.name: SpendingPurposeRequired
data.value: Spending purpose is required for this type of entry.

data.name: PaymentStatusNotAllowed
data.value: Payment status must not be set for entries of type Income or Credit Card Expense.

data.name: SpendingAreaMustBeEmptyWhenIncome
data.value: The 'Spending Area' field must not be provided for incomes.

data.name: SpendingPurposeMustBeEmptyWhenIncome
data.value: The 'Spending Purpose' field must not be provided for incomes.

data.name: VerificationCodeAlreadyUsed
data.value: Verification code has already been used.

data.name: RefreshTokenRequired
data.value: The RefreshToken must not be null or empty.

data.name: FinancialEntryIdIsRequired
data.value: The Financial Entry ID is required.

data.name: PageNumberMustBeGreaterThanZero
data.value: The page number must be greater than zero.

data.name: PageSizeMustBeBetween
data.value: The page size must be between {0} and {1}.

data.name: FileNameTooLong
data.value: The file name is too long.

data.name: FileNameContainsInvalidCharacters
data.value: The file name contains invalid characters.

data.name: YearCannotBeInFuture
data.value: Year cannot be greater than the current year.

data.name: MonthYearCannotBeInFuture
data.value: Month and year cannot be greater than the current month and year.
